00019 #ifndef OB_TEXT_H
00020 #define OB_TEXT_H
00021 
00022 #include <openbabel/babelconfig.h>
00023 #include <openbabel/base.h>
00024 
00025 namespace OpenBabel
00026 {
00028 class OBText : public OBBase
00029 {
00030 private:
00031   std::string txt;
00032 public:
00033   //Constructors
00034   OBText(){}
00035   OBText(const std::string& text) :txt(text) {}
00036 
00038   std::string GetText()const { return txt; }
00039   
00067   std::string GetText(std::string::size_type& pos, bool ToInsertOnly=false) const
00068   {
00069     std::string::size_type oldpos = pos;
00070     std::string::size_type newpos = txt.find("OPENBABEL_INSERT", pos);
00071     if(newpos== std::string::npos)//not found: return rest of txt
00072     {
00073       if(ToInsertOnly)
00074         return("");
00075       pos = 0;
00076       return txt.substr(oldpos);
00077     }
00078 
00079     newpos = txt.rfind('\n', newpos); //to end of previous line
00080     pos = txt.find("\n", newpos+1)+1; //to past end of line, or 0
00081     return txt.substr(oldpos, newpos-oldpos);
00082   }
00083 
00084   void SetText(const std::string& text){ txt = text; }
00085 };
00086 
00087 }//namespace
00088 #endif //OB_TEXT_H
00089
